Package com.googlecode.swtfinder.core.finder

Provides finders and conditions

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IConditionFind Condition interface for Finder class.
 

Class Summary
ConditionClassAssignableFind This Condition checks if class of control to be checked is classV or subclass of classV.
ConditionCombinedFind This condition can combile an array of conditions, the check result is to "&&" each condition.
ConditionFalse a always false condition
ConditionFieldValue this Condition uses java reflection to check a special field of a Control.
ConditionGetTextFind this Condition checks the getText result of the Control to be checked.
ConditionMethodInvoke This Condition checks the result of a method,(method must have no para)
ConditionTagFind this condition checks the tags for the Control
ConditionTrue a always true condition
Finder This class is used to find a Control in View/Editor or under any Control
all method of this class can be called both in UI thread and non ui thread.
 

Package com.googlecode.swtfinder.core.finder Description

Provides finders and conditions
